formattedAddress: 616 Amsterdam Ave, New York, NY 10024, USA
adrFormatAddress: 616 Amsterdam Ave, New York, NY 10024, USA

editorialSummary.text: Chain selling clever arrangements & gift baskets made up of fresh & chocolate-dipped fruit.

originalText.text: 1st time trying Edible Arrangements for a graduation. Overall I guess everything went well but during the ordering process, got prompted to add a graduation balloon and it was perfect in the site picture with a cap, diploma and the words congrats. But on delivery, the balloon was just a generic congrats balloon. Was very disappointed about that.

text.text: 1st time trying Edible Arrangements for a graduation. But on delivery, the balloon was just a generic congrats balloon. Was very disappointed about that.

originalText.text:
I pre ordered balloons, customized cars, and 2 dozens of roses. How some of my order get delivered for my fiance. So I call, and the young lady says it wasn't able to he delivered because no one answered the door and the order is in the shop. I said "how's that possible when I was just on the phone with her and she was telling me how she loves the card?"

The young lady was very confused as I was. Beside I was a bit frustrated because they are unorganized. She then called me back and said the guy realized he forgot the flowers and will bring them back after his current delivery. It's now been 2 hours and still no flowers. And it's says they are closed right now. If this is the case, someone should've called me. This is the worst customer service ever. ðŸ˜’

If your closed you should have the machine say, Your closed.

UPDATE::I've called the manager who's never there. I spoke to Jazzman several times and she hangs up the phone on me because she said what she had to say, her words exactly.. I've called corporate  on Monday and still no results. I called today, Wednesday and now a case was opened up.

originalText.text: Parked @ the bus stop, in & out in under a minute. Purchased this bowl of pre cut fruits for $3.00 flat.  fresh fruit great taste and in Manhattan for the price you can't go wrong.

originalText.text:
I donâ€™t usually write reviews but I I felt that I had such outstanding service from Anthony at store #1187 -Edible Arrangements on the Upper West Side that I wanted to post something.

Instead of flower arrangements which are usually a waste, I ordered large Peace and Dove arrangements.  They were gorgeous with the chocolate covered pineapple and strawberries. The guests raved.
We are so appreciative. Many thanks.

originalText.text:
Ordered an arrangement for my wife to be delivered on Mother's Day.

These geniuses delivered it a day early and told her they were 'too backed up' to deliver it on Mother's Day.

They did not consult me and made this decision alone. Had they told me this I would have canceled the order and handled it with another company that can handle standard holiday volume.

Their initial solution before I basically forced them to refund me was to go back and retrieve the arrangement from my wife and then deliver her a new one on the correct day.

Real classy.
